properties.displayName: UAC Bypass Abusing Winsat Path Parsing - Process
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessIntegrityLevel in~ ("High", "System")) and InitiatingProcessCommandLine contains "C:\\Windows \\system32\\winsat.exe" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\system32\\winsat.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using a path parsing issue in winsat.exe (UACMe 52)
